summary: Comprehensive testing of Barcelona Taxi Portal new features completed. Newsletter functionality, news section, and updated navigation all working correctly. Backend APIs functioning properly with 14/14 tests passed.

integration_issues.issue: First news article (tarifas-taxi-barcelona-2026.html) content not loading correctly while second article loads fine

passed_tests: Services page with all 8 categories displayed
News article navigation and back button
All service categories API endpoints working
Footer newsletter form integration with backend
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Check why tarifas-taxi-barcelona-2026.html content is not loading properly in the news article page (second article loads fine). This is a low priority issue as main functionality is working.
